channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mattresses fly tipping, 30th June
item.description:
Please help! They dumped these mattresses on the pavement outside 45 Londesborough Road - and a few days back someone put them inside our front garden!! They probably mistakenly thought we dumped them on the pavement.. please remove them thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Londesborough Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside nu 47 star street, 30th June
item.description:
This is an almost everyday occurrence. Other tenants leave their rubbish out for collection on Monday and Thursdays. Not number 47. Westminster refuse don’t collect this rubbish as it isn’t all black bin household rubbish. It is owned by a hotelier who lets out the flats but there is ALWAYS rubbish outside on every day of the week. Can someone speak to the owner please so he can tell his occupants about the rubbish
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Star Street, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Scaffolding at 596 Kingsland Road is still up. The license expired 17 June 2035, 30th June
item.description:
The scaffolding makes a busy narrow road even harder to walk through. It is especially bad for people with mobility issues. The licence for the scaffold has expired. Scaffold reference TFL16346

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ashwin Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Oak tree on Chislehurst road needs to be taken back as branches are causing damage to vehicles entering and leaving property, 30th June
item.description:
The oak tree is located on a public pathway in a conservation area therefore cannot be touched by homeowners. The branches are weighted heavily to one side of the tree causing it to lean towards property 251 and 249. The branches are so low now that they are causing damage to vehicles entering and leaving property 251 Chislehurst Road. There is also deadwood which has been landing in the garden and driveway of 251 which is dangerous and will cause harm if not properly pruned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 240, Chislehurst Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clifden Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Park Lane Trash, 30th June
item.description:
